pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Justin Masterson; Adam Dunn is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .767 OPS against them this season and .703 against everything else.
Justin Masterson is trying to tie up Adam Dunn with fastballs inside; Dunn is hitting .067 on pitches in that location compared to .194 overall.
Justin Masterson battled back from 3-0 to retire Adam Dunn.
